{{{
<Header/>
	Parent: <swf>
	Children: none
	Attributes: width,height,fps,version,compressed,frameCount
		Mandatory: none
		Default:width=800, height=600, fps=30, version=10, compressed=true, frameCount=1
	Signature: <Header width="800" height="600" fps="30" version="10" compressed="true" frameCount="1" />
	Usage: <Header/>

<FileAttributes/>
	Parent: <swf>
	Children: none
	Attributes:actionscript3,useNetwork,useDirectBlit,useGPU,hasMetaData
		Mandatory: none
		Default: actionscript3=true, useNetwork=false, useDirectBlit=false, useGPU=false, hasMetaData=false
	Signature: <FileAttributes actionscript3="true" useNetwork="false" useDirectBlit="false" useGPU="false" hasMetaData="false" />
	Usage: <FileAttributes/> (You must use this tag right after the <Header/> tag if the final swf contains AS3)

<SetBackgroundColor/>
	Parent: <swf>
	Children: none
	Attributes:color
		Mandatory: none
		Default: color=0xffffff
	Signature: <SetBackgroundColor color="0xFFFFFF" />
	Usage: <SetBackgroundColor/>

<ScriptLimits/>
	Parent: <swf>
	Children: none
	Attributes:maxRecursionDepth,scriptTimeoutSeconds
		Mandatory: none
		Default values : maxRecursionDepth=256, scriptTimeoutSeconds=15
	Signature: <ScriptLimits maxRecursionDepth="256" scriptTimeoutSeconds="15" />
	Usage: <ScriptLimits/>

<DefineBitsJPEG2/>
	Parent: <swf>
	Children: none
	Attributes:id,file
		Mandatory: id,file
		Default:
	Signature: <DefineBitsJPEG2 id="?" file="./path/to/file *.jpg, *.png, *.gif" />
	Usage: <DefineBitsJPEG2 id="1" file="picture.jpg" />

<DefineShape/>
	Parent: <swf>
	Children: none
	Attributes: id, bitmapId, x, y, scaleX, scaleY, rotate0, rotate1
		Mandatory: id, bitmapId
		Default :  x=0, y=0, scaleX=1.0, scaleY=1.0, rotate0=0.0, rotate1=0, repeat=false, smooth=false
	Signature: <DefineShape id="?" bitmapId="?" x="0" y="0" scaleX="1.0" scaleY="1.0" rotate0="0.0" rotate1="0" repeat="false" smooth="false" />
	Usage: <DefineShape id="2" bitmapId="1/>

<DefineShape/>  
	Parent: <swf>
	Children: none
	Attributes: id, width, height, fillColor, lineWidth, lineColor
		Mandatory: id, width, height
		Default : fillColor=0x000000 lineWidth=0 lineColor=0x000000
	Signature: <DefineShape id="?" width="?" height="?" fillColor="0x000000" lineWidth="0" lineColor="0x000000" />
	Usage: <DefineShape id="1" width="100" height="200"/>

<DefineSprite></DefineSprite>
	Parent: <swf>
	Children: <PlaceObject/>,<RemoveObject/>,<StartSound/>,<FrameLabel/>,<ShowFrame/>,<EndFrame/>
	Attributes: id
		Mandatory: id
		Default: frameCount=1
	Signature: 
	<DefineSprite id="?" frameCount="1">
		<PlaceObject id="?" depth="?" name="" move="false" x="0" y="0" scaleX="1.0" scaleY="1.0" rotate0="0.0" rotate1="0.0" />
		<RemoveObject depth="?" />
		<StartSound id="?" stop="false" loopCount="0" />
		<FrameLabel name="?" anchor="false" />
		<ShowFrame />
		<EndFrame />
	</DefineSprite>
	Usage: 
	<DefineShape id="1" width="100" height="100"/>
	<DefineSprite id="2" frameCount="1">
		<PlaceObject id="1" depth="1"/>
		<ShowFrame />
		<EndFrame />
	</DefineSprite>

<DefineButton></DefineButton>
	Parent: <swf>
	Children: <ButtonState/>
	Attributes: id 
		Mandatory: id
		Default:
	Signature:
	<DefineButton id="?">
		<ButtonState id="?" depth="?" up="false" over="false" down="false"  hit="false" x="0" y="0" scaleX="1.0" scaleY="1.0" rotate0="0.0" rotate1="0.0" />
	</DefineButton>
	Usage:
	<DefineShape id="1" width="100" height="100"/>
	<DefineButton id="2">
		<ButtonState id="1" depth="1" up="true"/>
		<ButtonState id="1" depth="1" over="true"/>
		<ButtonState id="1" depth="1" down="true"/>
		<ButtonState id="1" depth="1" hit="true"/>
	</DefineButton>

<DefineBinaryData/>
	Parent: <swf>
	Children: none
	Attributes:
		Mandatory: id, file 
		Default:
	Signature: <DefineBinaryData id="?" file=".path/to/file *.any" />
	Usage: <DefineBinaryData id="1" file="movie.swf" />

<DefineSound/>
	Parent: <swf>
	Children: none
	Attributes:
		Mandatory: id, file 
		Default:
	Signature: <DefineSound id="?" file=".path/to/file *.mp3" />
	Usage: <DefineSound id="1" file="song.mp3" />

<DefineFont/>
	Parent: <swf>
	Children: none
	Attributes:
		Mandatory: id, file 
		Default:
	Signature: <DefineFont id="?" file="path/to/swf/containing/font.swf" />
	Signature: <DefineFont id="1" file="arial.swf" />

<DefineEditText/>
	Parent: <swf>
	Children: none
	Attributes:id, width, height, wordWrap, multiline, password, input, autoSize, selectable, border, wasStatic, html, useOutlines, fontID, fontClass, fontHeight, textColor, maxLength, align, leftMargin, rightMargin, indent, leading, variableName, initialText, file
		Mandatory: id 
		Default:useOutlines=false, fontID=null, initialText="", file="", width=100, height=100, wordWrap=true, multiline=true, password=false, input=false, autoSize=false, selectable=false, border=false, wasStatic=false, html=false, fontClass="", fontHeight=12, textColor=0x000000ff, maxLength=0, align=0(/1/2/3), leftMargin=0, rightMargin=0, indent=0, leading=0, variableName=""
	Signature: <DefineEditText id="?" fontID="?(if useOutlines)" useOutlines="false" initialText="" file="" width="100" height="100" wordWrap="true" multiline="true" password="false" input="false" autoSize="false" selectable="false" border="false" wasStatic="false" html="false" fontClass="" fontHeight="12" textColor="0x000000ff" maxLength="0" align="0" leftMargin="0" rightMargin="0" indent="0" leading="0" variableName="" />
	Usage: <DefineEditText id="1" initialText="hello"/>

<DefineABC/>
	Parent: <swf>
	Children: none
	Attributes:file
		Mandatory: file
		Default:
	Signature: <DefineABC file="path/to/swf/containing/abc.swf" />
	Usage: <DefineABC file="movie_with_abc.swf" />

<PlaceObject/> 
	Parent: <swf> or <DefineSprite>
	Children: none
	Atributes: id, depth, name, move, x, y, scaleX, scaleY, rotate0, rotate1
		Mandatory: id, depth 
		The move and id attribytes indicate whether a new character is being added to the display list, or a character already on the display list is being modified:
		-move = false and id is present: A new character (id) is placed on the display list at the specified depth. 
		-move = true and id is absent: The character at the specified depth is modified. Because any given depth can have only one character, no id is required.
		-move = true and id is present: The character at the specified Depth is removed, and a new character (id) is placed at that depth. 
		Default: name="", move=false, x=0, y=0, scaleX=1.0, scaleY=1.0, rotate0=0.0, rotate1=0.0
	Signature: <PlaceObject id="?" depth="?" name="" move="false" x="0" y="0" scaleX="1.0" scaleY="1.0" rotate0="0.0" rotate1="0.0" />
	Signature: <PlaceObject id="1" depth="1" />

<RemoveObject/>
	Parent: <swf> or <DefineSprite>
	Children: none
	Atributes: depth
		Mandatory: depth
		Default:
	Signature: <RemoveObject depth="?" />
	Usage: <RemoveObject depth="1" />


<StartSound/>
	Parent: <swf> or <DefineSprite>
	Children: none
	Attributes:id, stop, loopCount
		Mandatory: id
		Default:stop=false, loopCount=0
	Signature: <StartSound id="?" stop="false" loopCount="0" />
	Usage: <StartSound id="1"/>

<SymbolClass/>
	Parent: <swf>
	Children: none
	Attributes:id, class
		Mandatory: id, class
		Default:
	Signature: <SymbolClass id="?" class="?" />
	Usage: 
	<SymbolClass id="0" class="flash.boot" />
	<SymbolClass id="1" class="com.example.MyMovieClip" />

<FrameLabel/>
	Parent: <swf> or <DefineSprite>
	Children: none
	Attributes:name, anchor
		Mandatory: name
		Default:anchor=false
	Signature: <FrameLabel name="?" anchor="false" />
	Usage: <FrameLabel name="home" />

<ShowFrame/>
	Parent: <swf> or <DefineSprite>
	Children: none
	Attributes:none
	Signature: <ShowFrame/>
	Usage: <ShowFrame/>

<EndFrame/>
	Parent: <swf> or <DefineSprite>
	Children: none
	Attributes:none
	Signature: <EndFrame />
	Usage: <EndFrame />

<swf></swf>
	Parent: none (root/document element)
	Children:
		<Header/>,<FileAttributes/>,<SetBackgroundColor/>,<ScriptLimits/>,
		<DefineBitsJPEG2/>,<DefineShape/>,<DefineSprite>,<DefineButton>,<DefineBinaryData/>,<DefineSound/>,<DefineFont/>,<DefineEditText/>,<DefineABC/>,
		<PlaceObject/>,<RemoveObject/>,<StartSound/>,
		<FrameLabel/><ShowFrame/><EndFrame/>
	Attributes: none
	Signature:
<?xml version="1.0" ?>
<swf>
	<Header width="800" height="600" fps="30" version="10" compressed="true" frameCount="1" />
	
	<FileAttributes actionscript3="true" useNetwork="false" useDirectBlit="false" useGPU="false" hasMetaData="false" />
	
	<SetBackgroundColor color="0xFFFFFF" />
	
	<ScriptLimits maxRecursionDepth="256" scriptTimeoutSeconds="15" />
	
	<DefineBitsJPEG2 id="?" file="path/to/file *.jpg, *.png, *.gif" />
	
	<DefineBinaryData id="?" file="path/to/file *.any " />
	
	<DefineSound id="?" file="path/to/file *.mp3" />
	
	<DefineFont id="?" file="path/to/swf/containing/font.swf" />
	
	<DefineEditText id="?" initialText="" fontID="" useOutlines="false"  width="100" height="100" wordWrap="true" multiline="true" password="false" input="false" autoSize="false" selectable="false" border="false" wasStatic="false" html="false" fontClass="" fontHeight="12" textColor="0x000000ff" maxLength="0" align="0" leftMargin="0" rightMargin="0" indent="0" leading="0" variableName="" file="" />

	<DefineShape id="?" bitmapId="?" x="0" y="0" scaleX="1.0" scaleY="1.0" rotate0="0.0" rotate1="0" repeat="false" smooth="false" />
	
	<DefineShape id="?" width="?" height="?" fillColor="0x000000" lineWidth="0" lineColor="0x000000" />
	
	<DefineSprite id="?" frameCount="1">
		<PlaceObject id="?" depth="?" name="" move="false" x="0" y="0" scaleX="1.0" scaleY="1.0" rotate0="0.0" rotate1="0.0" />
		<RemoveObject depth="?" />
		<StartSound id="?" stop="false" loopCount="0" />
		<FrameLabel name="?" anchor="false" />
		<ShowFrame />
		<EndFrame />
	</DefineSprite>
	
	<DefineButton id="?">
		<ButtonState id="?" depth="?" up="false" over="false" down="false"  hit="false" x="0" y="0" scaleX="1.0" scaleY="1.0" rotate0="0.0" rotate1="0.0" />
	</DefineButton>
	
	<PlaceObject id="?" depth="?" name="" move="false" x="0" y="0" scaleX="1.0" scaleY="1.0" rotate0="0.0" rotate1="0.0" />
	
	<RemoveObject depth="?" />
	
	<StartSound id="?" stop="false" loopCount="0" />
	
	<FrameLabel name="?" anchor="false" />
	
	<DefineABC file="path/to/swf/containing/abc.swf" />
	
	<SymbolClass id="?" class="?" />
	
	<FrameLabel name="?" anchor="false" />
	
	<ShowFrame />
	
	<EndFrame />
<swf/>
}}}
